title: Full-Stack Developer
description: The Brown Patience Company is a firm for writers and by a writer, it offers variety of services from Book writing and Editing, Coaching for Authors and Content writing.
achievements: Utilized TinyMce to streamline blog content management, leading to an increase in publishing efficiency and a more engaging user experience.
Enhanced website data management through efficient utilization of Firebase for blog data storage and admin authentication, resulting in improved overall website functionality.

Designed and optimized interfaces for a service-oriented platform, enhancing user experience and client engagement. Developed responsive and scalable components using React.js and Tailwind CSS, improving platform performance.

title: Front-End Engineer
description: YCF is digital space for youth-focused meetings to speak on Jesus and his works.
achievements: I developed the Young Christian Fellowship website to create a welcoming digital space for youth-focused faith engagement. The goal was to provide a responsive, modern platform for sharing devotionals, event updates, and community outreach.
I implemented a clean UI with Tailwind CSS, ensured mobile optimization, and integrated dynamic content sections to support spiritual growth and community connection.

title: Frontend Web Developer
description: Dimchi is a startup company that deals with the sale of women's hair extensions, wigs, hair accessories and products.
achievements: Independently built a responsive landing page for showcasing hair products, leveraging React.js, Styled-components, and Material-UI.
Demonstrated ability to architect and define front-end frameworks to address complex design challenges in accordance with creative direction.
Collaborated effectively with brand manager from different time zones, resulting in a 20% increase in website traffic, enhancing brand visibility and market reach.
